title: An M2 iPad Pro with MagSafe support could be only a few months away
content:
Apple has been actively releasing new and upgraded products for the past few months. These include the iPhone SE 3 (2022), M1 Ultra-powered Mac Studio, and the Studio Display. However, the company could be planning for even more reveals this year. A previous report by Bloomberg’s Mark GurmanÂ states that Apple could be working on the

The post An M2 iPad Pro with MagSafe support could be only a few months away appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple will reportedly release an M2 iPad Pro with MagSafe support later this year. The reveal could be between September and November.
